com.montefiore.gaulthiergain.adhoclibrary.datalink.wifi

Interface ConnectionWifiListener


  • public interface ConnectionWifiListener

    This interface allows to define callback functions for the wifi connection process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClient(java.net.InetAddress groupOwnerAddress, java.net.InetAddress ownAddress)
      Callback when the device is a client.
      void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
      Callback when the connection fails.
      void onConnectionStarted()
      Callback when the connection is started.
      void onGroupOwner(java.net.InetAddress groupOwnerAddress)
      Callback when the device is the groupOwner.

    • Method Detail

      • onConnectionStarted

        void onConnectionStarted()
        Callback when the connection is started.

      • onConnectionFailed

        void onConnectionFailed(java.lang.Exception e)
        Callback when the connection fails.

      • onGroupOwner

        void onGroupOwner(java.net.InetAddress groupOwnerAddress)
        Callback when the device is the groupOwner.
        Parameters:
        groupOwnerAddress - an InetAddress object which represents the current address' group owner.

      • onClient

        void onClient(java.net.InetAddress groupOwnerAddress,
              java.net.InetAddress ownAddress)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Callback when the device is a client.
        Parameters:
        groupOwnerAddress - an InetAddress object which represents the current address' group owner.
        ownAddress - an InetAddress object which represents the address of the device.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
